response_parsed.title: Harden Notebooks for Production with FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer outlines the process of securing and optimizing Jupyter notebooks for production use by integrating them with FastAPI, a modern web framework for building APIs in Python 3.12+.
key_points: Install required dependencies: FastAPI, Uvicorn, PyJWT, and Passlib
Create a FastAPI application and define API routes to handle requests from notebooks
Wrap Jupyter notebook cells in async functions for concurrent execution
Use authentication and authorization mechanisms like JSON Web Tokens (JWT) and password hashing for secure access control
Implement input validation, error handling, and logging
Configure Docker container to deploy the integrated FastAPI-notebook application
Optimize notebooks for better performance and scalability

Be aware of security risks associated with running untrusted code in a production environment
Regularly update dependencies and review security best practices
